response.overview: A closer look into the private life of the famous Kazakh singer, former soloist of the first female vocal instrumental ensemble in the USSR "Aigul". The name of the heroine is Karlygash, translated into Russian as “swallow”. The fate of this woman is accompanied by constant luck and success, and is comparable to the swift flight and serene singing of a small bird in the sky. But this is only at first glance. A deep drama, where personal pain is connected with the difficult history of her family and the Kazakh people, often drives the actions of this bright and exceptionally gifted woman. And at one of the critical moments of her life she will have to remain silent... After a long, harsh winter, will we hear the Swallow singing again?
response.title: Ласточка
